input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: (1) QOOLA - Wearable Air Conditioner with Ion Purifier (2) Temperature from 15C to 45C (3)Negative air ion removes contaminants (4) comfort and fresh air

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: busy parents
sentences: Looking for a way to keep your family comfortable and safe during the hot summer months? Look no further than QOOLA! Our wearable air conditioner with ion purifier is perfect for keeping you and your loved ones cool and free from contaminants.

Introducing the Qoola wearable air conditioner – the perfect way to keep cool and comfortable during the hot summer months. This innovative device features an ion purifier that removes contaminants from the air, providing you and your family with fresh and healthy air to breathe. The temperature can be set from 15C to 45C, making it perfect for any climate.

Summertime is great for spending time outdoors and enjoying the warm weather, but sometimes the heat and humidity can be too much to handle. That's where QOOLA comes in! This wearable air conditioner with ion purifier can keep you cool and comfortable anywhere, anytime.
